Package com.hcl.currencyexchange.manager

Class DatabaseManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hcl.currencyexchange.manager.ApiManager
      • com.hcl.currencyexchange.manager.DatabaseManager
  • @Service
public class DatabaseManager
extends ApiManager

    Database manager

    The class DatabaseManager is used to handle inserting, updating and extracting data to/from the database.
    Since:
    2023-05-18

    • Method Detail

      • insertExchangesFromAPI

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> insertExchangesFromAPI​(java.lang.String date,
                                                                                     CurrenciesEntity curFrom,
                                                                                     CurrenciesEntity curTo)
        This method is used to insert records in the currency_conversion table using information extracted from the API.
        Parameters:
        date - The date of the transaction. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.
        curFrom - The object is used to get the specific ID for the currency that will be exchanged.
        curTo - The object is used to get the specific ID for the currency that the user will exchange into.
        Returns:
        Map A HashMap object with a String - String key - value pair if inserting failed. A HashMap object with a String-JoinTableBean key-value pair if inserting was successful.

      • updateById

        public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> updateById​(java.lang.Float rate,
                                                                            java.lang.String date,
                                                                            java.lang.String curFrom,
                                                                            java.lang.String curTo)
        This method is used to manually update the rate of a record from the currency_conversion table.
        Parameters:
        rate - The updated rate for the transaction.
        date - The date of the transaction. Date format: YYYY-MM-DD.
        curFrom - The currency ISO to be converted (ex. USD, EUR, etc).
        curTo - The currency ISO to convert into (ex. USD, EUR, etc).
        Returns:
        ResponseEntity
